SPLIT based on different attacks; CVE-2005-0065, CVE-2005-0066, CVE-2005-0067, and CVE-2005-0068 are related identifiers that are SPLIT based on the underlying vulnerability.  While CVE normally SPLITs based on vulnerability, the attack-based identifiers exist due to the variety and number of affected implementations and solutions that address the attacks instead of the underlying vulnerabilities."}]}}, "impact": {"baseMetricV3": {"cvssV3": {"baseScore": 5.0, "baseSeverity": "MEDIUM"}}}, "publishedDate": "2004-04-12T04:00Z", "lastModifiedDate": "2018-10-19T15:30Z"},
